channel.title: How to be invisible on torva pkz 637?
channel.description:
im not sure if this is a client issue, so i dont know whether i have posted this in the right section but i was wondering if it is possable to make your self invisible to other players and not show up on the minimap and when they hover over me it wont show up as an option.
NOTE: i know you can do ::pnpc 2003 and stuff like that but i still show up on the minimap and when people hover over me they can see me.

item.title: How to be invisible on torva pkz 637?
item.dc:creator: @Katt Katt
item.description:
@Katt wrote:

I’d need this one too… it’s good to find out, are people bad, etc…

Read full topic
item.source: How to be invisible on torva pkz 637?
